properties.name: languageserver.boot.enable-jandex-index
properties.description: Enables/disables Jandex indexing of Java types. When disabled JDT LS will be used for type and package searches, type finding for FQ name etc.

properties.name: languageserver.boot.symbol-cache-dir
properties.description: The path to the cache directory where the language server stores symbol information

properties.name: languageserver.boot.symbol-cache-enabled
properties.description: Enable's or disables disk-based symbol cache. This is enabled by default.
